data.system_settings: iPhone 8 Plus, iPad Air 2 - iOS 12 Public Beta 8
data.actual_result: Nothing happens, Discord doesn't ask for this permission and you don't see it in your iOS settings.
data.expected_result: Discord should ask for location services permission.
data.short_description: Nearby Feature: Discord doesn't ask for Location Services permission
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to your friends screen - Click on the add friends button - Click on `Find Friends` - If necessary, click a second time
